text: Elmer is an unincorporated community in Rapides Parish, Louisiana, United States. The community is located on Louisiana Highway 112, southwest of Alexandria. Elmer has a post office with ZIP code 71424, which opened on May 15, 1888. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Rapides Parish, Louisiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Louisiana
title: Elmer, Louisiana
